title: How to Monetise WordPress Services
headline: Learn how to make money selling WordPress services on Fiverr and other marketplaces in this free online course.
description: Do you want to make money online by selling web services while working from home and having flexible hours? Learn how to sell web development services based on WordPress to customers regularly. Explore ways of maximising your earnings by following Sorin's techniques to rank your services higher to appear faster in search results. This course also explains managing workload and increasing your value per customer.
courseDescription:
WordPress is a content management system (CMS) that allows you to host and develop websites with the help of different themes, plugins and other tools. WordPress services can be a landing page design, web design, speed optimisation and more and there are people on the net that need these services. We will show you how to make money online by selling WordPress design and creation services on Fiverr. Fiverr is a popular online marketplace where professionals provide services in exchange for cash. Explore how to set up your account on Fiverr, rank your services higher and appear faster in search results. Selling your services on Fiverr starts with creating offers, called ‘gigs’, on the platform. Discover how to create gigs to reach a wide range of potential buyers, make them attractive to buyers and get more people to purchase your services. 

Acquiring your initial sales online can be challenging because users are less likely to buy your services without reviews and ratings. We will show you how to get your initial sales and receive reviews and ratings at the beginning to make you stand out from your competitors. Following that, you'll discover strategies for ensuring a steady flow of clients while also increasing your seller rating as a recognition for your hard work. We will demonstrate how to install WordPress for your clients and use WordPress Premium Vault to get more clients by creating professional-looking websites. As you progress, you may not be able to handle all the tasks required and may need a virtual assistant (VA). You will examine the importance of a VA and the right places to source a VA for your online services. Having learned that, we will introduce you to an online project management tool, Asana, to help you work with different teams, partners and collaborators.

We designed this course for people who want to earn money online by selling their web development services. It is also helpful for professionals already in the web development field who wish to improve their skills and knowledge base. You don't need to have any previous experience in web development to enrol. This course breaks down different techniques for attracting new clients for your services and creating a consistent income source. The online marketplace offers you the convenience of working from anywhere and setting your own work hours. Many professionals worldwide are earning a substantial amount of money by offering web development services to potential clients. Join this course for free and sell your services from the comfort of your home.
